charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(A) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE. Consp: Poss w/intent to distribute and dispense cocaine hydrochloride, a schedule II narcotic controlled substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft Abelardo Solano pleaded guilty to count 1 of the indictment. Dft assessed $50.00. Dft is to be imprisoned for a period of 120 months followed by 3 years on supervised release. Dft shall not possess a firearm or destructive device. Fine is waived. Statement of reasons attached. (1)
